solution_line_template: In {months_until_fight} months, he will lose {kg_lost_per_month} x {months_until_fight} = <<{kg_lost_per_month}*{months_until_fight}={total_kg_lost}>>{total_kg_lost} kilograms.
So his weight will be {initial_weight} – {total_kg_lost} = <<{initial_weight}-{total_kg_lost}={final_weight}>>{final_weight} kilograms.
